nodes.text: Trabzon Road was a street in the city of Myrra, the capital of the planet Akiva. Following the Battle of Endor, the junk dealer Temmin Wexley stole a crate from a transport belonging to the crime lord Surat Nuat, that had crashed on Trabzon Road. As a result, Surat sent several of his henchmen to punish the youth. However, Temmin and his B1-series battle droid Mister Bones defeated the henchmen. Temmin then gave Mister Bones orders to dump the unconscious criminals on the eddies of water where the Kora Biedies met Trabzon Road.
